All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Align
A SingleChildParent which aligns its single child within itself
Align.AlignOptions
 
Alignment
Represents the alignment of an object relative to another
AlphaInterpolation
 
Animation
Animation holds a value which increments from 0 to 1 over some duration.
Animation.RepeatMode
Indicates how an animation behaves when it reaches its end
Animation.State
Constants for the state of an Animation
Animation.StateListener
Callback interface for Animation state changes
Animation.ValueListener
Callback interface for Animation value changes
AnimationCurve
AnimationCurve transforms an Animation value from a (0 - 1) range to a point on a curve equation defined in AnimationCurve.get(double) method.
Antialiasing
 
Application
Application is the heart of a GameKit program.
Audio
Audio handles loading and playback of sounds in GameKit
AudioAttenuation
AudioAttenuation defines how AudioClip3D falls off as it moves away from the AudioListener
AudioClip
AudioClip is abstract class which stores and handles playback for audio in GameKit.
AudioClip2D
AudioClip2D is a AudioClip which updates its audio parameters without spatialization.
AudioClip3D
AudioClip3D is a AudioClip which uses spatialization to update its parameters in relation to the AudioListener.
AudioGroup
AudioGroup are attached to multiple a group of AudioClip objects in order to group control their properties
AudioListener
AudioListener is a reference point for AudioClip3D sources to compute their volume and pan
AudioShape
AudioShape models the area around an AudioClip3D in which attenuation occurs.
AudioShapeCircle
A AudioShape which defines a circular attenuation area around AudioClip3D
Blend
An abstract composite which blends source and destination colors in a way to produce the final pixel color.
Bounds
Bounds represents a region in 2D space
Button
A Widget which can be clicked to trigger an event
Button.ButtonOptions
 
Camera
Camera controls which part of the game world is visible in the Window.
Center
An SingleChildParent which centers its single child within itself
Colored
A Leaf which renders a solid color background
Colored.ColoredOptions
 
Column
A Flex which arranges its children vertically
Column.ColumnOptions<T extends Column.ColumnOptions<T>>
 
Compose
A Widget which is an abstract base for creating custom widgets.
Constants
Constants store for engine
Constraints
An immutable record for width and height range values
CrossAxisAlignment
Constants determining how children of a Flex parent are aligned along the cross axis
Dithering
 
Empty
A Leaf with no size which renders nothing.
Flex
A MultiChildParent which arranges its children linearly along one axis
Flex.FlexOptions<T extends Flex.FlexOptions<T>>
 
Image
A Leaf which renders a BufferedImage to the screen
Image.ImageOptions
 
ImageFit
Constants determining how the image should be resized/fitted in its bounds
ImageInterpolation
 
Input
Input handles keyboard and mouse input detection for use in the application.
InputEvent
Abstract class representing UI events in the engine.
InputEventHandler
Interface for Widgets which can process InputEvents
InputEventStore
Convenience class which stores structures of InputEvent
IO
IO handles resource access
Leaf
A leaf is a Widget which has no children
MainAxisAlignment
Constants determining how children of a Flex parent are aligned along the main axis
Math
Provides commonly used math utility methods
MouseEvent
Abstract base class for mouse related events.
MouseEvent.Listener
Callback interface for a MouseEvent handler
MouseEvent.Type
Represents the type of MouseEvent
MultiChildParent
A parent which contains multiple child Widgets
NinePatch
Mixin for Widgets which render a 9-patch background
Opacity
A SingleChildParent which renders its child with transparency
Opacity.OpacityOptions
 
Padding
A SingleChildParent which adds padding around its single child
Padding.PaddingOptions
 
Panel
A SingleChildParent which uses the 9-patch algorithm to render a BufferedImage as a background to its descendants
Panel.PanelOptions
 
Parent
A parent is a Widget which can contain one or more children.
Position
Represents an (x,y) position
Prop
Prop represent game objects in a Scene.
Renderer
Renderer provides draw methods to draw on the current Window
RenderingStrategy
 
Resolution
Represents the width and height the window at startup
Row
A Flex which arranges its children horizontally
Row.RowOptions<T extends Row.RowOptions<T>>
 
Scaled
A SingleChildParent which scales the computed size of its child
Scaled.ScaledOptions
 
Scene
Scene represents a logical part of your game.
Setting
 
Settings
Settings contains startup configuration object for an Application instance
SingleChildParent
A parent which contains only one child Widget
Sized
A SingleChildParent which enforces a size on its child.
Sized.DimensionType
 
Sized.SizedOptions
 
Spacing
Represents a padding or margin of a Widget
Stack
A MultiChildParent which stacks its children on top of each other
Task
Interface for an arbitrary task
Text
A Leaf which renders text to the screen
Text.TextOptions
 
TextAntialiasing
 
Timeout
Timeout executes a specified Task after its duration has elapsed.
UI
UI manages the user interface within a Scene
UI.WidgetTreeCreator
 
UI.WidgetTreeUpdater
 
Vector
Represents an (x,y) position
Widget
A widget is an abstract representation of a portion of a Scene's user interface.
Window
Window which manages the JFrame and image buffers the application is rendered in
WindowMode
